summary:
I am a hardworking, honest individual. I am friendly, helpful, keen and very willing to learn and develop new skills.

The most important for me to think in system and provide the results in high quality level.

- Certified Six sigma black belt. 
- Certified Lead auditor.

school.name: Óbuda University, Donát Bánki Faculty Mechanical Engineering

profile_positions.description:
As Supplier Quality Engineer in the Mechatronic Systems Development department I am the direct link for optimum engineering collaboration between ASML’s development teams and our mechatronic supplier base. Using my in-depth technical knowledge, analytic thinking and excellent people skills, I work closely with suppliers to build up an profound knowledge of their IP and technological capabilities. The MSD SQE is part of the D&E project team and has interfaces with project leaders, design engineers and architects but also with logistics, procurement and manufacturing-, customer- and quality support engineers.
By feeding that knowledge back into our development programs, I am enable ASML to make the right sourcing decisions. 

• New product introduction (NPI) and supplier selection together with the Sourcing department
• Early supplier involvement in the D&E (MSD) with the mechatronic suppliers to secure technology expertise of ASML and supplier are merged in the best way
• Ensure that manufacturability, costs and serviceability aspects are covered in the design phase. Including implementing of lessons learned
• SQA deliverables that secure parts quality from suppliers such as the Statement Of Work, TPD Acceptance by Supplier, (Proto) Evaluation reports, manufacturing flows, P-FMEA, Test Coverage Documents including SPC and Part Qualification Report 
• Arrange and control supplier interface processes, such as Issue resolution, Judgement on root cause analysis, Qualification deviation, Configuration management, ASML factory disturbances
• Contribute to supplier development to improve operational excellence by driving execution of existing agreements and improvement actions
profile_positions.title: Supplier Quality Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Conduct Audit in supply chain against ISO 9001 and ISO 13485 certificates
•	Maintain Supplier Master File
•	Monitor Supplier Product Quality Trending in Operations and lead supplier improvement projects
•	Develop supply base on Quality tools (8D, pFMEA, CP, SPC, etc.)
•	Manage and solve product quality issues that have high impact assessment result, by using 8-D methodology with Suppliers 
•	Monitor and approves SCAR
•	Quality Notification follow up
•	Support change request management and ensure execution in Product Lifecycle Management
•	Gather required information to lead, report and drive action progress for monthly Supplier Performance Meeting
•	Support Quality Engineers to identify and assess cost impact for Philips and safety impact for the end customer, patient and personnel.
•	Ensure continuously feedback and required escalations to Supplier Quality Manager on Supplier Quality issues in order to drive continuous improvement
•	Lead the monthly SCAR review meeting together with Q&R, Strategic SQE and Operations QA to monitor and evaluate the FDA compliancy, the effectiveness and the harmonized way of working in execution and documenting the SCAR process
profile_positions.title: Strategic Supplier Quality Engineer

profile_positions.description:
• Total response for various technologies 
• Support the rump up phase from the very begining of the project till the serial production
• Specify and install the new machines for the production
• Cooperation directly with the supplier 
• Product development together with the MD
• Process optimization
• Process- and machine capability calculations
• Make improvement projects for IRR, scrap, OEE with cost and resource calculation
• Make improvements based on time schedules. 
• Continuous control and prepair the prodcution documents for (internal and external) audits 
• Root casue analysis and problem solving due to the unexpected issues
• Lead action team for complex projects
• Present the machine related issues/reports to the management
• Plan the production material flow,machine layouts
• Visit other Continental plants for getting experience and problem solving solutions
• Continuous participant on an international technology specified team
• Train operators 
• Support and work together with machine setters department on machine issue
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer
